request.description: Cards
Initialize Paystack Transaction
Investment Snapshot
Wallet Snapshot
Recent Transactions

Savings Portfolio
Get the list of customer's savings
{
"token":""|Login token 
}
Important Response Data
IS_ACTIVE - Indicates if the investment is active|1 - Active 
INVESTMENT_ID -  Represent the unique id of the investment - Its also the plan_id in other endpoints,
REQUEST_PRINCIPAL - Amount of the investment,
REQUEST_TENOR - Duration of the investment in months,
DATE_ADDED - Date investment was created
FUNDS_RECEIVED_DATE - The contract date for the savings
INVESTMENT_TITLE - Savings title
REQUEST_RATE - The interest rate applied to the investment
BID_RATE_PERIOD_ID - Unit of the interest rate - 1- Per day | 2 - Per Month | 3 - Per Year
REQUEST_TENOR_IN_DAYS - The duration of the investment in days
DAYS_USED - Number of days the investment has used
TTM - Number of days left for investment to mature
MATURITY_DATE - The date the investment is going to mature
PERCENT_DAYS_USED - Number of days the investment has used in percentage
FREQUENCY - Frequency of savings - 1 - Daily , 2 - Monthly , 4- Weekly

{

}
Important Response Data
IS_ACTIVE - Indicates if the investment is active|1 - Active

Important Response Data
IS_ACTIVE - Indicates if the investment is active|1 - Active 
INVESTMENT_ID -  Represent the unique id of the investment - Its also the plan_id in other endpoints,
REQUEST_PRINCIPAL - Amount of the investment,
REQUEST_TENOR - Duration of the investment in months,

FUNDS_RECEIVED_DATE - The contract date for the savings
INVESTMENT_TITLE - Savings title
REQUEST_RATE - The interest rate applied to the investment
BID_RATE_PERIOD_ID - Unit of the interest rate - 1- Per day | 2 - Per Month | 3 - Per Year
REQUEST_TENOR_IN_DAYS - The duration of the investment in days
DAYS_USED - Number of days the investment has used
TTM - Number of days left for investment to mature
MATURITY_DATE - The date the investment is going to mature
PERCENT_DAYS_USED - Number of days the investment has used in percentage
FREQUENCY - Frequency of savings - 1 - Daily , 2 - Monthly , 4- Weekly

Investment Products Endpoint
Get list of investment products offered
{
    "token": "***"|Token from the customer login endpoint
}
Important Response Data
INVESTMENT_PRODUCT_ID - Indicates the investment product a customer wants to invest in
INVESTMENT_AMOUNT -  Minimum amount that can be invested in the product,
INVESTMENT_MAX_AMOUNT - Maximum amount that can be invested in the product,
TENOR - Minimum duration allowed for the investment (in months),
MAX_INVESTMENT_DURATION - Maximum duration for the investment
INTEREST - Interest rate for the investment per annum,
INVESTMENT_TITLE - Title of the investment product,
INVESTMENT_DESCRIPTION - Description of the investment product

Pending Investments
Get the list of customer's pending investments under review
{
"token":""|Login token 
}
Important Response Data
IS_ACTIVE - Indicates if the investment is active|1 - Active 
INVESTMENT_ID -  Represent the unique id of the investment - Its also the plan_id in other endpoints,
REQUEST_PRINCIPAL - Amount of the investment,
REQUEST_TENOR - Duration of the investment in months,
DATE_ADDED - Date investment was created
MATURITY_VALUE - The value of the investment when it matures,
TOTAL_INTERESTS - Total Interests to be earned on the investment,
FUNDS_RECEIVED_DATE - The contract date for the investment - Approved date the investment is to start
INVESTMENT_TITLE - Investment title
REQUEST_RATE - The interest rate applied to the investment
BID_RATE_PERIOD_ID - Unit of the interest rate - 1- Per day | 2 - Per Month | 3 - Per Year
